name: CVE-2013-3956
description: The NICM.SYS kernel driver 3.1.11.0 in Novell Client 4.91 SP5 on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003; Novell Client 2 SP2 on Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008; and Novell Client 2 SP3 on Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted 0x143B6B IOCTL call.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:novell:client:4.91:sp5:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:novell:client:2.0:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:novell:client:2.0:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x64:*:*:*:*:*'))]
